title: [BUG] SKCanvasView on MAUI only fires Pressed touch event
body:
I enabled touch events on the MAUI SKCanvasView, but only the Pressed action is coming through. You don’t even get the release action. No move actions either.


**Expected Behavior**

Touch events work

**Actual Behavior**

Only the pressed event fires

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  latest
- Last known good version:  none
- IDE:  VSMPreview
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - MacCatalyst:
- Target Devices:
  - Mac
